Articles.Content: Earlier today i was look at the mechjeb addon and noticed space plane tab and theres only two listing both landing strips on the main kerbal planet i was wondering if someone has or is or will develop a mod that allows you to create a landing strip on a planet/moon or a mobile space landing strip. If someone has developed one can someone post a link for the newest version of KSP
ExtraPlanetary Launchpads? I guess that's your only option.

Extraplanetary Lanchpads

HL Runways and Landing Pads
thank you i have been looking couldnt find anything
